files.patch:
@@ -400,1 +400,1 @@
-    cannot reference {0} before constructor has been called
+    Reference {0} must be after an explicit constructor invocation
@@ -404,1 +404,1 @@
-    cannot assign initialized field ''{0}'' before constructor has been called
+    Initialized field assignment ''{0}'' must be after an explicit constructor invocation
